com.snapon.sbs.dns.mailer

Class MailerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snapon.sbs.dns.mailer.MailerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.alisonassociates.npd.framework.schedule.ManagedTask, Runnable

    public class MailerService
extends Object
implements com.alisonassociates.npd.framework.schedule.ManagedTask
    This class polls the EMAIL_JOB table for new jobs and if it finds any that have not yet started, will pass them to a mailer handler.

    • Field Summary
